live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
30604.summary: Some customers in Red Deer and Olds and its surrounding area are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30604.title: Dec 17 - Red Deer & Olds | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
